approach_assessment.reason: The target (apple) is visible and unobstructed in front of the robot. The distance to the target is within the safe front distance.

probe_raw:
user
You are given a single RGB frame from AI2-THOR and a target object class. Return a compact structured assessment with focus on the target. Output only valid JSON, no extra text.





TARGET_OBJECT: Apple
Fields:
target_visible: true/false
target_visibility: one of ["clear","partial","uncertain","none"]
target_location_hint: one of ["top_left","top","top_right","left","center","right","bottom_left","bottom","bottom_right","unknown"]
related_objects: array of up to 5 strings
confidence: integer 0-100
If uncertain, set target_visible=false and target_visibility="uncertain".
model
```json
{
  "target_visible": true,
  "target_visibility": "clear",
  "target_location_hint": "bottom_left",
  "related_objects": [
    "countertop",
    "knife",
    "cutting_board",
    "apple_basket",
    "cabinet"
  ],
  "confidence": 95
}
```
